mapper.insert: insert into SKYPG.MSG_QUEUE (MSEQ, MSG_TYPE, SEND_TYPE, DKEY, DCNT, DSTADDR, CALLBACK, STAT, SUBJECT, TEXT_TYPE, TEXT, EXPIRETIME, FILECNT, FILELOC1, FILESIZE1, FILELOC2, FILESIZE2, FILELOC3, FILESIZE3, FILELOC4, FILESIZE4, FILELOC5, FILESIZE5, FILECNT_CHECKUP, INSERT_TIME, REQUEST_TIME, SEND_TIME, REPORT_TIME, TCPRECV_TIME, SAVE_TIME, TELECOM, RESULT, REPCNT, SERVER_ID, OPT_ID, OPT_CMP, OPT_POST, OPT_NAME, EXT_COL0, EXT_COL1, EXT_COL2, EXT_COL3, SITE_CD, CORP_ID) values (#{mseq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{msgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sendType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dstaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiretime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{filecnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileloc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileloc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileloc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize3,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileloc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize4,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileloc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize5,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{filecntCheckup,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tcprecvTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{saveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{telecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{repcnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serverId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{optId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optCmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCol0,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{extCol1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCol2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extCol3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SKYPG.MSG_QUEUE set MSG_TYPE = #{msgType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEND_TYPE = #{sendType,jdbcType=CHAR}, DKEY = #{dkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCNT = #{dcnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DSTADDR = #{dstaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALLBACK = #{callback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=CHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEXT_TYPE = #{textType,jdbcType=CHAR}, TEXT = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRETIME = #{expiretime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILECNT = #{filecnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILELOC1 = #{fileloc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE1 = #{filesize1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILELOC2 = #{fileloc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE2 = #{filesize2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILELOC3 = #{fileloc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE3 = #{filesize3,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILELOC4 = #{fileloc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE4 = #{filesize4,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILELOC5 = #{fileloc5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILESIZE5 = #{filesize5,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FILECNT_CHECKUP = #{filecntCheckup,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUEST_TIME = #{requestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REPORT_TIME = #{reportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TCPRECV_TIME = #{tcprecvTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SAVE_TIME = #{saveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TELECOM = #{telecom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=CHAR}, REPCNT = #{repcnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, OPT_ID = #{optId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_CMP = #{optCmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_POST = #{optPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_NAME = #{optName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL0 = #{extCol0,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, EXT_COL1 = #{extCol1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL2 = #{extCol2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_COL3 = #{extCol3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_CD = #{siteCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MSEQ = #{mseq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select MSEQ, MSG_TYPE, SEND_TYPE, DKEY, DCNT, DSTADDR, CALLBACK, STAT, SUBJECT, TEXT_TYPE, TEXT, EXPIRETIME, FILECNT, FILELOC1, FILESIZE1, FILELOC2, FILESIZE2, FILELOC3, FILESIZE3, FILELOC4, FILESIZE4, FILELOC5, FILESIZE5, FILECNT_CHECKUP, INSERT_TIME, REQUEST_TIME, SEND_TIME, REPORT_TIME, TCPRECV_TIME, SAVE_TIME, TELECOM, RESULT, REPCNT, SERVER_ID, OPT_ID, OPT_CMP, OPT_POST, OPT_NAME, EXT_COL0, EXT_COL1, EXT_COL2, EXT_COL3, SITE_CD, CORP_ID from SKYPG.MSG_QUEUE where MSEQ = #{mseq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select MSEQ, MSG_TYPE, SEND_TYPE, DKEY, DCNT, DSTADDR, CALLBACK, STAT, SUBJECT, TEXT_TYPE, TEXT, EXPIRETIME, FILECNT, FILELOC1, FILESIZE1, FILELOC2, FILESIZE2, FILELOC3, FILESIZE3, FILELOC4, FILESIZE4, FILELOC5, FILESIZE5, FILECNT_CHECKUP, INSERT_TIME, REQUEST_TIME, SEND_TIME, REPORT_TIME, TCPRECV_TIME, SAVE_TIME, TELECOM, RESULT, REPCNT, SERVER_ID, OPT_ID, OPT_CMP, OPT_POST, OPT_NAME, EXT_COL0, EXT_COL1, EXT_COL2, EXT_COL3, SITE_CD, CORP_ID from SKYPG.MSG_QUEUE
